attributes.action: Have a referendum on Clause 17 of the Trade Bill to protect the NHS.
attributes.additional_details:
The wishes of the British public should be taken into consideration when deciding the future of the NHS. This is arguably far more important to the British public than the In/Out referendum which resulted in Brexit.

Our NHS is sacred and the British public should decide on its availability to be used as a bargaining chip in a trade deal.
attributes.background: Host a national referendum on the inclusion of Clause 17 of the Trade Bill which secures protection of the NHS during future trade deals.
